PiggyGoldRules.Rule1: Piggy Gold is a 3-reel, 1-row video slot featuring Wild symbols with Multipliers.

Rule2.value: The game is played with 1 bet line (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of  %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
Rule2.comment: Both %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be replaced with game available chip size, do not translate.
Rule2.example: The game is played with 1 bet line (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.1 to 8.

PiggyGoldCommonRule.WildExplanation: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols.
PiggyGoldCommonRule.DoubleSymbolFeatureExplain: While the reels are spinning, the pig below the reels may add two same symbols on reel 1 and 3.
PiggyGoldCommonRule.WildMultiplierFeatureExplain: When a Wild symbol with x2, x5 or x10 appears on reel 2 and there is a win, that win will be multiplied by the multiplier value.

PiggyGoldInfoBoardMessage.Message2: Wild with x2, x5 or x10 may appear in reel 2!
PiggyGoldInfoBoardMessage.Message3: Pig may award you two same symbols in reel 1 and 3!
